member.name: T:Health.Direct.Xdm.Xd.Slot
member.summary: Represents an ebXML Slot.
member.remarks:
A slot has a name and a list of values. Slots may be single or multiple valued; use the appropriate constructor.
The resulting XML will be:
<Slot name="slotname"> <ValueList> <Value>value1</Value> <Value>value2</Value> <Value>...</Value> </ValueList> </Slot>

member.name: M:Health.Direct.Xdm.Xd.Slot.#ctor(System.String,System.String)

member.param: The single value in the value list

member.summary: Intializes a multivalued slot with the specified values.

member.remarks: The values are: (1) A single value of "uri" (2) A set of values, each one is of the form "n|uripart", where n must range from 0->n but where the set is not guaranteed to be ordered. In this form, n may equal 1 :-)
